Interface Mob

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Builder, Critter, Explorer, Player

    public interface Mob
    Anything which can fight.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fight(Mob mob)
      Fight another mob.
      int getDamage()
      How much damage could this mob do in one hit?
      boolean isAlive()
      Is this Mob alive?
      void setAlive(boolean alive)
      Set this Mob's status.
      void takeDamage(int amount)
      Attempt to damage this Mob.
      boolean wantsToFight(Mob mob)
      Does this Mob want to fight mob?

    • Method Detail

      • fight

        void fight(Mob mob)
        Fight another mob. This mob gets first hit.
        Parameters:
        mob - the target

      • wantsToFight

        boolean wantsToFight(Mob mob)
        Does this Mob want to fight mob?
        Parameters:
        mob - possible target
        Returns:
        true if we want to fight that Mob

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Is this Mob alive?
        Returns:
        true if the Mob's health > 0

      • setAlive

        void setAlive(boolean alive)
        Set this Mob's status. Note: setting a Mob back to alive will set its health back to its max health. Setting a Mob with >0 health to false will set its health to 0.
        Parameters:
        alive - life status

      • getDamage

        int getDamage()
        How much damage could this mob do in one hit?
        Returns:
        damage amount

      • takeDamage

        void takeDamage(int amount)
        Attempt to damage this Mob.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of damage
